Comments_List: You probably have to take it, but it's still an interesting way to get to know some ways people actually apply what we're learning and many of the speakers are super interesting.
Maybe bring in more interesting topics; Really liked the one about bacteriaphages and the woman who reached out to the military to save her husband.
You have to take this class for EMD.
10/10. best lecture series. even bought the perfect predator book
The after-lunch sessions with the speakers were good when they occurred, but I wish this would have been implemented more. It is a better way to get to know the speakers in a smaller setting
Know more about frontier Public Health research
Great course that introduces students to a variety of different topics, presented by experts in the field.
This is a weekly speaker series from experts in the field of epidemiology. It's interesting and required for EMD students.
